name: Importing the SDK library produces executable code
testSteps:
Import the SDK using the following code: 
```
import 'package:flutter_fibricheck_sdk/flutter_fibricheck_sdk.dart';
```
expectedResult: The script runs successfully without errors
parentNames: Include the SDK in a 3rd party application
Ability to import SDK in a code environment
The SDK is exposed as a Flutter package that can be imported
